transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Customer: Hello?
Customer: Hello ha ji Ankit ji?
Customer: Hello ha ji?
Executive: Hello?
Executive: Ha Ankit ji Himanshu bol raha hu good afternoon sir.
Customer: Ha ji ha ji. Ji sir good afternoon. A ha sir. Sir actually aapko connect kiya tha aapne ticket raise ki thi kya hua sir?
Customer: Hmm ticket raise kiya tha. Ha mai call kiya hai IndiaMART ke us pe shayad customer care pe.
Customer: Acha acha acha. Ha abhi kuch sir ne matlab shayad kara hoga sir se kuch baat ho raha hoga shayad ye mujhe to pata nahi ye to bata rahe the ki maine ticket raise kiya hai baat bhi ek minute rukiyega mere paas mail aaya kya ek minute line pe rukiyega.
Executive: Ha ha.

Customer: To usme mail me kya likha hai sir ne matlab wo mail matlab usme kya aapko aapko isme aata nahi hai kya wo usme hi likha hua hai ki kya kis cheez ke regarding.
Executive: Nahi nahi unhone concern concern raise kiya hua hai ki aap matlab basically apna jo kya kehte hai plan change karna chahte hain to help nahi mil rahi hai aapko puri aisa to nahi hai sir help to puri kar hi raha hu mai kya hua matlab mai samajh nahi paya ab.
Executive: Sir se to continuously matlab kal bhi baat hua tha mera shayad kal bhi maine baat kiya tha 40 minute baat kiya hai help kya nahi ho pa raha hai mai bas ye janna pa raha hu janna chah raha hu ki sir ko kya issue aa raha hai. Mujhe lag raha hai ki wo shayad abhi Naveen ji ne kuch message kiya hoga ha sir bata to rahe the ki Naveen ji se to keh rahe the ki wo wo pata nahi us cheez ke liye kar rahe hain aur thoda sa unko way of talking unka samajh nahi aa raha hai ya kis tarah se wo baat kar rahe hain is regarding tha wo unka to to wo abhi aise keh rahe the ki chalo mai wo karta hu to is kuch isme detail me likha hai unhone ki aise kuch?
Executive: Matlab wahi hai ki issue.
Customer: Mujhe aap ek minute dijiye ek bar mai dobara na ek bar sir se mai aise aapko call karne wala tha wo mail matlab jo iske proposal ke regarding.
Executive: Ha sir wo actually isko karke isko kara dijiye at least na wo ho jayega clear. Isme jo abhi mujhe pata laga hai na kya hua na ki direct aap bhi maine baat wo karaya tha jise isme mai ye cheez puch raha tha ki jaise kal aap keh rahe the ki ek email karne email karne wale hain aap kuch MDC MDC ka jaise keh rahe hain. Ha baat baat baat ye hai sir baat ye hai sir ki jo hamara jo purana jo hai na maximizer ka jo service hai usme dekhiye jo yearly leads hoti hai wo yearly leads aapko matlab agar aap plan change karoge to wo jayegi nahi mai wahi cheez aapko bata raha tha.
Customer: To wo uske regarding matlab wo chah rahe the lekin aap usko proposal aap ek bar dekhoge na purana wala to usme aapko ye cheez pehle se hi milegi usme pehle se hi hai.
Customer: Nahi nahi matlab hum ye kehna chah rahe hain ki jaise man lijiye meri 100 something by list isme hai already theek hai jo non laps ke bola gaya tha aapki taraf se wo laps nahi ho rahi hai kuch time se hum continue kara rahe hain to ab wo hum yahi to kehna chah rahe hain ki aap hame ek mail me detail me de dijiye ki wo laps nahi hongi to bas wo itna sa cheez hai. Ha ji ha.
Executive: Sir dekho non lapsable non lapsable non lapsable jo lead hoti hai na jo yearly lead hoti hai wo yearly lapsable hoti hai mai ye nahi keh raha ki dekho ki abhi aap jaise agar package karoge to wo chali jayegi wo rahegi lekin wo yearly basis pe laps kar jayegi ye bhi mai aapko bata du jaise weekly by lead hoti hai to weekly laps karti hai daily by lead hoti hai wo daily laps karti hai.
Customer: Ha ha. Chalo mera matlab aap ye kehna chah rahe ho ki jaise suppose humne renew karaya aap se ab theek hai abhi matlab main aaj humne karaya jo bhi date pe karaya to aap ye kehna chah rahe ho ek saal wo valid rahengi.
Executive: Ha matlab jaise agar aap ye jo yearly by lead aapki padi hui hai na maximizer jo aapke 109 by lead padi hui hai wo yearly lapsable hoti hai to jaise agar aap pure abhi jo saal hai pura theek hai agar aap isme use kar loge isko to definitely wo matlab aapke is saal tak rahengi agar next year tak me bhi agar aapki koi lead bachi reh gayi yearly wale me to wo khatam ho jayegi sir mai ye batana chah raha hu aapko.
Customer: Nahi nahi to year jo aap na date se to count karte honge na I mean ye ye matlab waise lete ho aap January to December is tarah se count karte ho.
Executive: Ha matlab ye yearly lapsable hoti hai sir iska jo basically ye hoti hai to sir jaise man lijiye main koi package main November me le raha hu to ab ye thodi na hoga ki November to November hoga na next year jaise khatam hone ka. Ha ha exactly exactly ha exactly exactly aise hi hota hai.
Customer: Ha to sir yahi cheez wo kya hai na ki aap iski kya surety de rahe hain wahi wo puchna chah rahe the ki ab usme man lijiye laps ho gayi suppose mai mai ek cheez kehta hu ki humne renew karaya MDC liya wo kal se usme show honi band ho jayegi to sir fir uski. Nahi sir wo wo nahi hogi wo nahi hogi sir wo nahi hogi mai bata raha hu na aapko aap matlab is cheez ko mai aise aise written me agar aap mujhse mangoge to sir mai aapko ye bata du ki ye pehle se hi proposal me included hota hai aur isko written me lene ka koi fayda nahi hai sir mai aapko batau ye cheez pehle se hi mentioned hoti hai jo complimentary leads hoti hain jo yearly lapsable hoti hai wo year ke basis pe laps hoti hai to isme agar mai matlab likh ke mai aapko jo bata raha hu ki agar aapko ye likhit me lene ka koi logic hi nahi hai kyuki ye pehle se hi matlab by default ye system pe hi uploaded hai year ke hisab se year wali cheez year laps karegi. Kyuki ye sab cheez actually isliye concern hua hai ki abhi aap se jab baat ho raha tha na starting me to aapne bola ki wo plan change hoga to sab wo chali jayengi to ab hame plan change hoga mai aapko maan raha hu ki ha us time pe jab humse baat hui thi to aapne aapne kaha tha jo lead jo hoti hai na hamari weekly aur daily basis wali wo wo rahengi ki wo chali jayengi to mai uske basis pe keh raha tha ki sir wo to change ho jayegi na kyuki seedhi si baat hai abhi aapko kitna wo to sir mujhe bhi pata hai wo to weekly man lijiye mujhe 30 mil chuki hai to wo to 30 wo to main use nahi karunga ek bhi to wo to laps ho jayegi weekly wo to mujhe pata hai main to main ye kehna chahta mai ye kehna cha raha tha mai ye kehna cha raha tha aap us time jab puch rahe the na to ki jo weekly aapko 30 leads milti hai theek to abhi jaise MDC aap karoge to aapko 10 milenge wo mai uske point of view me keh raha tha ki sir wo change ho jayengi baki yearly leads to aapki jitni hai utni hi rahengi sir usko usko pareshan rehne ki zarurat nahi hai ki wo wo yearly year ke basis pe laps karti hai aisa nahi hota ki agar aap package change kar loge to wo change ho jayegi.
Customer: Nahi to sir wahi cheez ka hame thoda sa surety ab kaise man lijiye wo nahi hoga to fir hum uske liye kya kar sak payenge ab wo to chalo aapne to bata diya ki theek hai mere meri isme kya hoga ki suppose main liya to mujhe seven monday ko mai ek minute bata deta hu jaise monday ko meri 10 by list mere account me credit ho jayega theek hai weekly ho jati hai theek hai wo maine use kar liya to fir uske baad kya hota hai meri 10 by list suppose maine ek din me use khatam kar liya mera pura week bacha hua hai panch din bache hue hai to mere paas 100 something plus by list hai abhi jo meri yearly wali hai to man lijiye maine usme se panch 100 use kar liya fir mai weekly panch use kar raha hu to mera panch che mahine me wo matlab kuch mahino me khatam ho jayega wo to fir wo khatam ho gaya to wo khatam hi ho gaya lekin agar wo maine account renew karaya aur meri 100 by list wo khatam ho jaye wo dikhe hi na usme nahi nahi nahi jayegi sir nahi jayegi sir mai mai bol raha hu mai sure kar raha hu nahi jayegi yearly leads kabhi laps nahi karti hai is tarike se yearly leads year ke basis pe laps karti hai mera concern ye tha ki jo aap ye soch rahe the ki 30 leads jo aapko generate ho rahi hai maximizer me wo kam ho jayengi kyuki aap plan change kar rahe ho mai ye cheez samjhane ki koshish kar raha tha aapko nahi sir wo to mujhe bhi samajh tha ab ab ye cheez hai na dekho wo cheez ab sir ko maine wo bataya tha ab wo aapne bhi fir kaha ki to isme aap ek email ke niche likh dijiye ki aapke 100 something jo by list hai wo laps nahi hongi to usme sir ek point aapko note usme karna hai itna bada koi matter hi nahi hai hum bhi aapko nahi karenge lekin isme kya hota hai thoda sa kal ko mai aap se baat karne lagu is cheez ke liye to hum logo ko bol payenge bhi ha aapne bola tha ki laps nahi hongi bhi aap to access aapke paas hamare account hoga hi bhi aapke ji ji sir dekho actually aap dekho renew aapne pehle bhi to karaya hai na hai na aur aap MDC chalate the fir maxi chalaye ho to aisa to hai nahi ki lead aapki wo chali jayegi thoda matlab aap is cheez ko ye to matlab first time ho raha hai isse pehle jo bhi account manager rahenge na to unse bhi humne kabhi nahi bola kyuki maximizer to maximizer ho sakta tha wo hamare paas account balance me rehta hi tha lekin abhi jaise hum MDC kara rahe hain na to us cheez ke liye hum isliye puch rahe hain aap sir mai aapko bol raha hu nahi jayega but is cheez ko as a written me dene ka koi logic tha nahi karan ye hai mai bata raha hu aapko kyuki aap agar apna purana proposal bhi khol ke dekhoge na usme specifically mentioned hai ki jo yearly leads hoti hai wo year basis pe complimentary leads by leads jo hoti hai wo yearly basis pe laps karti hai aisa nahi hota aisa kahi nahi hota bas mera wo concern tha kyuki aap jab puch rahe the na to isliye maine aapko na kiya tha kyuki 30 leads ki jagah fir aapko 10 leads milna shuru ho jayengi kyuki cost type change hota hai wo to sir wo to clear tha hi wo to sir wo to tha lekin main jo hamara tha na wo yahi tha ki 100 something by list jo rakhi hui hai to uska kya wo rahegi rahegi wo wo rahegi sir wo kyu jayegi wo jayegi kyu aap khud bataye na jo aapki lead aapki purani hai aur aapki ikhatti hui lead hui ho rakhi hai aur yearly likha hua hai usme specifically likha hua hai yearly slash 109 to seedhi si baat hai wo year basis pe laps karenge aap usko consume kar loge to seedhi si baat hai wo khatam ho jayengi aap usko chodoge to jab year aap usko ye check karke sir bata sakte ho ki wo kab laps hongi uski date kya aa rahi hai yearly basis pe kab laps karengi theek hai mai aapko ek bar bata deta hu ek bar bata deta hu sir mere ko thoda sa time do mai ek bar ye nikal kar ke aapko bata deta hu aap 5 10 minute matlab le lijiye ya lunch ke baad theek hai mai aapko abhi 5 10 minute ka time do mai aapko abhi bata deta hu abhi bata deta hu theek hai theek hai
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants assurance yearly buyleads will not lapse.

- Wants written confirmation on buylead lapsing policy.



Resolution:

- Explained yearly leads lapse on a yearly basis.

- Clarified plan change will not affect yearly leads.

- Executive offered to check lapsing date.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back in 5-10 minutes.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, lapsing, maximizer, mdc
